content.body: my take is i'm not enthusiastic about going out and eliciting broad-spectrum feedback from committee for editorial decisions, unlike in incubator calls, where that's the whole point

content.body: but the editor calls aren't closed rooms, and people can certainly come if they have something editorial to discuss

content.body: Based on what I can see, it seems like you wouldn't get much feedback even if you did elicit it.
